location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:736 x 576 mm, on sheet 767 x 601 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Depth shown by isolines and soundings recorded in feet.A blueprint map no. B-953 dated 9 February 1934 compiled by the Bahrein Petroleum Company, Producing Department, sent with a letter no. C/105-10/1.VI.Shows the submarine pipe line with terminal and a pump station on Sitra Island, with the position of anchorage and fish traps marked.
